subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Yankees added a veteran to their young bullpen Sunday, agreeing to terms with the right-hander LaTroy Hawkins on a one-year contract worth about $3.75 million.
snippet: The Yankees added a veteran to their young bullpen Sunday, agreeing to terms with the right-hander LaTroy Hawkins on a one-year contract worth about $3.75 million.
